titleStmt.title: VVaters of Marah, and Meribah: or, the source of bitternes, and strife, sweetned and allayed by way of aduice, refutation, censure, against the pseudo-zelots of our age: by Humphrey Sydenham, master of arts, late fellow of Wadham Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Sydenham, Humphrey, 1591-1650?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Elizabeth Allde, for Nathaniel Butter,
